DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Total Years Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents, when thinking of all their childhood and adult years, the total number of years a person has ever lived in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Total Years Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A question about the total number of years a person, over all their childhood and adult years, has ever lived in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Total Years Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors

Concepts.longName: Total Years Lived in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors
Concepts.definition: A question about the total number of years a person, over all their childhood and adult years, has ever lived in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: . Added 0 in for deci place.  No version needed. AK 10/2/13

ReferenceDocuments.name: In total, for about how many
ReferenceDocuments.description: In total, for about how many years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Use Note
ReferenceDocuments.description: DCP-specific CDE. Use CDE 5286051 if you are using the full NCI-AACR C-TUQ: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: In total, for about how many years?  If less than 1, write "1."

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Enter a whole number (i.e. "4") only. Do not enter a range or fraction.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, in total, for about how many years? (If less than 1, write 1.)

DataElement.origin: C-TUQ:Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire. NCI-AACR Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Assessment Task Force, 6/19/2015
